description: This file defines the AttendeeMapper class responsible for converting between Attendee-related DTOs and entity objects within the event management backend. It provides methods for mapping registration DTOs to Attendee entities and Attendee entities to response DTOs.

classes.name: AttendeeMapper
classes.description: A component class that maps data transfer objects to entity objects and vice versa related to Attendee.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts an AttendeeRegistrationDto and Event into an Attendee entity object.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts an Attendee entity into an AttendeeResponseDto object.
